name: AUDIOGEST - Associação Para a Gestão e Distribuição de Direitos
goal:
The main Goals of AUDIOGEST are:
- Promote and defend the IP rights of the phonographic producers;
- Promote and defend fair and transparent market conditions for music (including in the digital market);
- Promote the consumption of music as a cultural product;
- Promote the enforcement of IP rights
- license and collect remunerations for the use of recorded music in Portugal.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Single market
euInitiatives:
- EC Collective Rights Management Directive
- EC Term of Protection Directive
